Question: LG Electronics CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
LG Electronics

CES 2024 Highlights

- Smart life solutions extending to mobility and commercial environments
- LG SIGNATURE OLED T and LG MAGNIT products unveiled
- SDV vision powered by LG αWare
- LG gram series expansion including the new LG gram Pro
- webOS zone showcasing the 10-year evolution of the platform
- AI Sound Pro with virtual 9.1.2 surround sound from built-in TV speakers
- WOW Orchestra feature integrating LG Sound Bar with TV speakers for 3D sound experience
- OLED technologies focused on health and environment benefits
Summary_cn:
LG电子

CES 2024亮点

- 智能生活解决方案扩展到移动和商业环境
- 发布了LG SIGNATURE OLED T和LG MAGNIT产品
- 由LG αWare驱动的SDV视觉效果
- LG gram系列扩展，包括全新的LG gram Pro
- webOS区展示了平台的10年演变
- AI Sound Pro通过内置的电视扬声器提供虚拟9.1.2环绕音效
- WOW Orchestra功能将LG Sound Bar与电视扬声器整合，提供立体声体验
- OLED技术专注于健康和环境效益
